content:
5.22. 
Inheritance of a part of the estate not designated by the will
1. The part of the testator's estate which remains unallocated by the will shall be divided among the heirs at law in accordance with the rules laid down in Articles 5.11 to 5.14 of this Code.
2. These heirs shall include those heirs at law to whom a share of the inheritance has been allocated by the will, unless the will provides otherwise.
